snippet.title: GALLIUM (Demo Version) by Andrew Ho (AX9900) | Scene 1
snippet.description:
Here is a short demo of a game that I’ve developed as my hobby project since 2020.

GALLIUM is a standard turn-based fantasy RPG indie game developed using the RPG Maker MZ engine.

The game is still in its development stage. Assets, content and gameplay are subject to changes.

For more updates and dev logs, please visit my Twitter account @ax9900.

Thank you!

Credits to the following creators for the materials:

ENGINE
RPG Maker MZ

DEVELOPER
Andrew Ho (AX9900)

RPG MAKER RELATED ASSETS
KADOKAWA CORPORATION
Gotcha Gotcha Games Inc.
Degica // Komodo

CUSTOM ART
Vibrato08
酒十九 (Nightyyyyyy)
Archinversion
Dinkk_Artz
KimShyuen
Denny Ibnu (Angan Kelana)
Bond4ng (Yabai)

MUSIC & SOUND
Youfulca (Wingless Seraph)
ISAo

VOICE ACTING
Koji Asano
Tetsuya Shouji

RPG MAKER PLUGINS
Visustella
Moghunter
TheoAllen
Mokusei Penguin
Pheonix KageDesu
Thirop (Booth TRP_ParticleMZ)

FONTS
Libre Baskerville (Lora)
Trajan Pro Regular
New Rodin Pro M

OTHERS
Rikudou
Cazwolf
Comshou
Celianna
Dreams Circle
Shigekichi
Meepkeiro
